title: The Bogoluibov Renormalization Group in Theoretical and Mathematical Physics
abstract: This text follows the line of a talk on Ringberg symposium dedicated to Wolfhart Zimmermann 70th birthday. The historical overview (Part 1) partially overlaps with corresponding text of my previous commemorative paper. At the same time second part includes some recent results in QFT and summarize an impressive progress of the "QFT renormalization group" application in mathematical physics.
